issue.title: [CF 1310] How to set\change parent of a group?
issue.body:
1) choose\create any group so that the parent is default (ParentUI)
2) try to change its parent to some other group and click OK - it will still ParenUI

I am new to TMW, so maybe it's a rather dumb question. I have imported some profile for my class. All icons are locked to each other and can be dragged as a whole - except one. I tried to set the parent of that icon to the "Group Anchor", so it will be locked too, but it just doesn't change. I tried to copy the parent field from locked groups, but nothing worked.


> Posted by CurseForge user NoobLock2 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1310 | Raw

comments.body:
Right-click-and-drag an icon in the group that you want to change the anchor of to the group you want to anchor it to, and choose the appropriate option.


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras
